mods.abstract: $500 REWARD. RAN AWAY from the residence of the subscriber, on Polyminia street, between Apollo and Nyades streets, on Monday, the 15th inst., the girl SARAH, a black, low of stature, aged about 35 years-- had on when she left a blue mixed with yellow calico dress. The above reward will be paid for her detention in any of the prisons of the Municipalities, or on her delivery to the undersigned. GEORGE BROOKES. [my29 3t]
